## Shape.LeftCM property

表示形状与其左列的水平偏移量，单位为厘米。

```csharp
public double LeftCM { get; set; }
```

### 例子

```csharp

[C#]
if (shape.LeftCM == 3)
    shape.LeftCM = 1;
```
